profile.name: Kelsey Hightower
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Cloud-Native Solutions Expert
profile.summary: Results-driven software engineer with a passion for cloud-native technologies, Rust systems programming, and open-source contributions. Proven track record of delivering scalable solutions with a focus on security, reliability, and performance.
profile.company:
Based on Kelsey Hightower's tech stack and location, I would recommend:

Insulet Corporation

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Designed and implemented cloud-native applications using Cloud Run, Kubernetes, and HashiCorp's Vault for secure data management.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop scalable solutions for Insulet's products, ensuring high availability and performance.
Contributed to open-source projects, including the development of a toy Kubernetes scheduler and Kubernetes Redis cluster configurations.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed multiple cloud-based applications using Python, Cloud Run, and HashiCorp's Vault for secure data management.
Provided technical support and guidance to clients on cloud-native technologies and Rust systems programming.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained multiple open-source projects, including a popular Python library for data analysis.
Contributed to the development of new features and bug fixes, ensuring the project's stability and security.
